stories.Title: Parkour, like a pro
stories.Description: A project led by Ziwen Zhuang and Zipeng Fu is helping robots master the art of parkour with their vision-based approach, allowing them to autonomously navigate complex environments.
stories.Tweet: Parkour, like a pro 📦 A project led by Ziwen Zhuang and Zipeng Fu is helping robots master the art of parkour with their vision-based approach, allowing them to autonomously navigate complex environments. #robotics https://robot-parkour.github.io/

stories.Title: A year in the cosmos
stories.Description: An unexpected twist in his plan to return home for spring break has turned into a record-breaking stay on the ISS. NASA astronaut Frank Rubio is set to spend 371 days in space.
stories.Tweet: A year in the cosmos 📦 An unexpected twist in his plan to return home for spring break has turned into a record-breaking stay on the ISS. NASA astronaut Frank Rubio is set to spend 371 days in space. #NASA https://arstechnica.com/space/2023/09/a-nasa-astronaut-will-finally-spend-a-full-year-in-space/

stories.Title: US takes regulatory action
stories.Description: In a historic gathering, leading tech figures, including Bill Gates, Elon Musk, and Mark Zuckerberg, discussed with US lawmakers the potential of AI and how to continue its responsible development.
stories.Tweet: US takes regulatory action 📦 In a historic gathering, leading tech figures, including Bill Gates, Elon Musk, and Mark Zuckerberg, discussed with US lawmakers the potential of AI and how to continue its responsible development. #ai https://interestingengineering.com/culture/us-regulate-ai-tech-ceos-and-lawmakers-meet

stories.Title: AI anxiety has taken over
stories.Description: A recent LinkedIn survey reveals complex emotions surrounding AI at work. While many professionals are excited about its potential, they also feel anxious and overwhelmed by it.
stories.Tweet: AI anxiety has taken over 📦 A recent LinkedIn survey reveals complex emotions surrounding AI at work. While many professionals are excited about its potential, they also feel anxious and overwhelmed by it. #ai https://www.fastcompany.com/90952613/ai-workplace-linkedin-excited-anxious-education

stories.Title: Great news for vendors!
stories.Description: Selling your products is now easier with Amazon's latest offering. The Generative Listing Content tool uses AI to craft comprehensive product listings from brief descriptions.
stories.Tweet: Great news for vendors! 📦 Selling your products is now easier with Amazon's latest offering. The Generative Listing Content tool uses AI to craft comprehensive product listings from brief descriptions. #amazon https://www.engadget.com/amazon-is-encouraging-sellers-to-use-ai-generated-product-listings-174755381.html

stories.Title: Dublin, get ready for AI
stories.Description: OpenAI's global expansion continues. The company is set to open an office in Dublin, Ireland by the end of this year, reaching new heights in the European market.
stories.Tweet: Dublin, get ready for AI 📦 OpenAI's global expansion continues. The company is set to open an office in Dublin, Ireland by the end of this year, reaching new heights in the European market. #openai https://www.techtimes.com/articles/296356/20230914/chatgpt-creator-openai-expands-europe-new-ireland-office.htm

stories.Title: The Japanese way
stories.Description: With substantial investments from tech giants and the government, Japanese researchers aim to build ChatGPT-like chatbots that truly convey the essence of their culture.
stories.Tweet: The Japanese way 📦 With substantial investments from tech giants and the government, Japanese researchers aim to build ChatGPT-like chatbots that truly convey the essence of their culture. #ai https://www.nature.com/articles/d41586-023-02868-z

stories.Title: A new round of layoffs...
stories.Description: Google's global recruiting organization is facing a significant reduction. According to the company, this is an unfortunate but necessary step given the evolving hiring landscape.
stories.Tweet: A new round of layoffs... 📦 Google's global recruiting organization is facing a significant reduction. According to the company, this is an unfortunate but necessary step given the evolving hiring landscape. #google https://www.cnbc.com/2023/09/13/google-is-cutting-hundreds-of-jobs-in-its-recruiting-organization.html

stories.Title: You certainly didn't miss this
stories.Description: If you've already caught up with all the announcements from Apple's "Wonderlust" event and you're eager for more, explore what they didn't unveil.

stories.Title: Durability and style
stories.Description: Elon Musk has hinted at an important feature for future Cybertruck owners, a "tungsten carbide coating" that makes it completely scratch-proof.
stories.Tweet: Durability and style 📦 Elon Musk has hinted at an important feature for future Cybertruck owners, a "tungsten carbide coating" that makes it completely scratch-proof. #tesla https://electrek.co/2023/09/14/tesla-cybertruck-coating-scratch-proof-diamonds/

title: Parkour-skilled robots, AI's emotional rollercoaster, The US moves toward regulation
description: Parkour! Robots may not be jumping across buildings yet, but a recent project is teaching them to be more autonomous when facing diverse obstacles. There are mixed feelings about AI in the workplace; a LinkedIn survey revealed that most professionals are anxious about it. Personally, I'm trying to keep my cool. And lastly, major names in the tech industry have gathered with US lawmakers.
